member.name: T:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.AbstractLocalTranslationMemory
member.summary: Abstract base class for bilingual file-based () and in-memory translation memories (). Do not inherit from this class.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.AbstractLocalTranslationMemory.Container
member.summary: Gets the container which contains the TM. This may be null if the container is unknown or has been passed to the service by other means.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.AbstractLocalTranslationMemory.FuzzyIndexes
member.summary: Gets or sets the set of fuzzy indices defined on this TM.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.AbstractLocalTranslationMemory.Recognizers
member.summary: Gets or sets the recognizers which are enabled for this TM. Note that changing recognizers may require reindexing. In addition, in some cases duplicate TUs may be in the TM if recognizers are enabled which have been disabled before.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.AbstractLocalTranslationMemory.Copyright
member.summary: Gets or sets the copyright string for this translation memory.
member.remarks: You have to call in order to perist changes to this property.

member.summary: Gets the creation date of this translation memory.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.AbstractLocalTranslationMemory.ExpirationDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the expiration date for this translation memory.
member.remarks: You have to call in order to perist changes to this property.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.AbstractLocalTranslationMemory.FieldDefinitions
member.summary: Gets the custom fields defined for this TM.
member.remarks: In case this is a server-based translation memory, which is associated with a fields template (see ), this returns a read-only fields collection identical to the template's fields collection. In all other cases, the field collection returned can be modified. Note that you have to call to persist any changes made to the fields.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.AbstractLocalTranslationMemory.LanguageResourceBundles
member.summary: Gets the language resources which are associated with this TM.
member.remarks: In case this is a server-based translation memory, which is associated with a language resources template (see ), this returns a read-only language resources collection identical to the template's language resources collection. In all other cases, the language resources collection returned can be modified. Note that you have to call to persist any changes made to language resources.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.AbstractMachineTranslationProviderLanguageDirection.SearchSingleSegmentInternal(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.SearchSettings,Sdl.LanguagePlatform.Core.Segment)
member.summary:
Obtains the translation for a single segment from the machine translation service and returns it in the field of a . Obtaining the translation may be through a round-trip to the server.
This method is abstract and must be implemented by derived classes.
To create a search result from a segment, you can use .
member.param: The segment to translate (must not be null)
The search settings to apply
member.returns: A data structure if the translation was successful, and null otherwise.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.AbstractMachineTranslationProviderLanguageDirection.SearchMultipleSegmentsInternal(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.SearchSettings,System.Collections.Generic.IList{Sdl.LanguagePlatform.Core.Segment})
member.summary:
Obtains the translation for a set of segments from the machine translation service and returns it in the field of a collection. Obtaining the translation should, but does not have to, result in only a single server round-trip.
This method is abstract and must be implemented by derived classes.
To create a search result from a segment, you can use .
member.param: The segments to translate (must not be null)
The search settings to apply
member.returns: A collection of data structures if the translation was successful, and null otherwise.

member.name: T:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Cascade`1
member.summary: A cascade is used to perform searches and updates across many different translation provider language directions. Each translation provider language direction is represented by a cascade entry that contains other information with regards to how it should be treated - e.g. what penalties should be applied during searches.
member.typeparam: T represents the cascade entry type. A simple cascade can just use but, for example, project cascades need more information associated with each cascade entry and uses ProjectCascadeEntry.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Cascade`1.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{`0},System.Boolean,System.Boolean,Sdl.Core.Globalization.CultureCode,Sdl.Core.Globalization.CultureCode)
member.summary: Constructor that takes the cascade entries, cascade search mode, remove duplicates, source language, and target language.
member.param: cascade entries
whether to stop searching when results have been found
remove duplicates
source language
target language

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Cascade`1.CascadeEntries
member.summary: Gets the cascade entries, which refer to a translation provider language direction and specify and optional penalty to apply when perforing look-ups.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Cascade`1.StopSearchingWhenResultsFound
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to stop searching when results have been found.
member.remarks: "Stop searching" means that the cascade will not search the next translation provider when results have been found in the current translation provider.

member.summary: Gets whether duplicates should be removed from search results.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Cascade`1.CheckTokensAndPlaceables(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.SearchResults,Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.SearchResults)
member.summary: Not all translation providers tokenize the source segment and evaluate the document placeables so check that this information is not lost when new results overwrite the current set of results. The most common occurrence is when a cascade contains a translation memory and a machine translation provider. The TM provider returns no matches but tokenizes the source segment. This will be overwritten by the MT result which probably won't tokenise the segment.
member.param: Current search results.
New search results.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.FileBasedTranslationMemory.IsUnlockedWithSufficientPermissions
member.summary: Determines whether the file based translation memory has been unlocked with sufficient permissions to be deemed available. When null, no attempt has been made to unlock the file based translation memory and obtain sufficient permission. When false, an attempt has been made to unlock the file based translation memory and obtain sufficient permission that failed. When true, an attempt has been made to unlock the file based translation memory and obtain sufficient permission that succeeded. If this is false then StatusInfo. Available will be false with a message "Not unlocked with sufficient permissions." This property should be set by the calling code after the user has been challenged.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.FileBasedTranslationMemory.SetAdministratorPassword(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the administrator password and unlocks the TM so the TM is open in administrator mode.
member.param: The password; or null to remove the password restriction. Note that setting this password to null also sets all the other passwords to null (if they are currently set).

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.FileBasedTranslationMemory.SetMaintenancePassword(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the maintenance password.
member.remarks: This method just updates the password stored in the TM. It does not unlock the translation memory. Use to do this.
member.param: The password; or null to remove the password restriction. Note that setting this password to null also sets all the read-write and read-only passwords to null (if they are currently set).
member.exception: Thrown when trying to set a maintenance password without having set an administrator password.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.FileBasedTranslationMemory.SetReadWritePassword(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the read write password.
member.remarks: This method just updates the password stored in the TM. It does not unlock the translation memory. Use to do this.

member.summary:
Deletes all translation units in the TM, using an iterator. The iterator will process only a fixed maximum number of translation units () and then the call will return, giving the client an opportunity to discontinue the process or update the UI before the next round-trip.
Optionally, a filter can be set on the iterator which then will only delete those TUs which satisfy the filter condition.
member.param: The iterator to use.
member.returns: The number of deleted translation units.

member.summary: Applies an to the translation units, using an iterator.

The update mode, which can be to update changed translation units in-place or add new translation units to the TM (which is only relevant if segment data has been changed).

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.FileBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.ReindexTranslationUnits(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.RegularIterator@)
member.summary:
Re-indexes the translation memory, using an iterator so that the client can update progress indicators or discontinue the process.
The same iterator instance should be passed in subsequent calls, in order to obtain the next page, and so on.
member.param: The iterator to use for the re-indexing process.
member.returns: False if the iterator is at the end of the TM or the TM is empty, true otherwise. The re-indexing process should be continued until the method returns false.
member.remarks: For larger TMs (> 100.000 TUs) it is recommended to also recompute the index statistics after the re-indexing finished (see ).

member.summary: Identical to except that the implementation will attempt to populate the and properties for any items in the collection of a tu
member.remarks: Implementations must ensure and are tokenized and that their collections are returned to the client.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.FileBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.GetDuplicateTranslationUnits(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.DuplicateIterator@)
member.summary:
Returns a set of potentially duplicated translation units in the TM, using a special . A group of TUs are considered potential duplicates of each other if the internal hash values for their source segments are identical. There may be several reasons for this being the case:
The TUs have the same source segment, but different translations
The TUs have different source segments, but only differ in complex tokens (controlled through the translation memory's ) which will result in the identical hash values,
The source segments only differ by whitespace or certain punctuation, which do not modify the hash values,
The hashing algorithm leads to collisions in which case the segments may be entirely different, but still result in the same hash value.
member.param: The iterator to use
member.returns: The translation units which are potential duplicates, or null if no more potential duplicates can be found.

member.summary: Returns the number of translation units in this TM. Note that the computation of the TU count may be a time-consuming operation for some back-end storage systems.
member.returns: The number of translation units.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.FileBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.UpdateTranslationUnit(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.TranslationUnit)
member.summary:
Updates the properties and fields of an existing translation unit if the source and target segments are unchanged or adds a new translation unit otherwise. If the provider doesn't support adding/updating, the implementation should return a reasonable ImportResult but should not throw an exception.
The translation unit should be initialized in a previous call to the translation memory, so that the ID property is set to a valid value.
member.param: The translation unit to be updated.
member.returns: The result of the operation.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.FileBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.UpdateTranslationUnits(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.TranslationUnit[])
member.summary:
Updates the properties and fields of an array of existing translation units if the source and target segments are unchanged or adds new translation units otherwise. If the provider doesn't support adding/updating, the implementation should return a reasonable ImportResult but should not throw an exception.
The translation units should be initialized in previous calls to the translation memory, so that their ID properties are set to valid values.
member.param: The translation unit array to be updated.
member.returns: An array of results which mirrors the translation unit array. It has the exact same size and contains the results for each translation unit with the same index within the translation unit array.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.FileBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.UpdateTranslationUnitsMasked(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.TranslationUnit[],System.Boolean[])
member.summary: Updates (adds, overwrites, or merges) the specified translation units.
member.param: The translation units to update.

An optional mask with the same length as . If provided, only those TUs in will be updated for which the corresponding flag in is true. Those TUs for which the corresponding flag is false will only be used to establish context information. If no masking is required, this parameter can be null.
member.returns: An array of s with the same length as , which indicates, for each translation unit, the action taken by the translation memory.

The settings that define the subsegment search parameters, or null if a subsegment search should not be performed.
The segment to search for.

member.summary: Performs a segment-level search, and optionally a subsegment search, for an array of segments.

If is not null, specifies the conditions under which a subsegment search will be performed.
The array containing the segments to search for.
member.returns: An array of objects, which mirrors the segments array. It has the exact same size and contains the search results for each segment with the same index within the segments array.

member.summary: Performs a segment-level search, and optionally a subsegment search, for an array of segments, specifying a mask which specifies which segments should actually be searched (only those for which the corresponding mask bit is true are searched). If the mask is null, the method behaves identically to . Passing a mask only makes sense in document search contexts ( set to true).
member.param: The settings that define the segment-level search parameters.
The settings that define the subsegment search parameters, or null if a subsegment search should not be performed.
If is not null, specifies the conditions under which a subsegment search will be performed.

The array containing the segments to search for.
member.returns: An array of objects, which mirrors the segments array. It has the exact same size and contains the search results for each segment with the same index within the segments array.

member.summary: Performs a translation unit search, and optionally a subsegment search on the source segment
member.param: The settings that define the segment-level search parameters.
The settings that define the subsegment search parameters, or null if a subsegment search should not be performed.
If is not null, specifies the conditions under which a subsegment search will be performed.
The translation unit to search for.
member.returns: An object containing the results or an empty object if no results were found.

member.summary: Performs a translation unit search, and optionally a subsegment search on the source segment, for an array of translation units.
member.param: The settings that define the segment-level search parameters.
The settings that define the subsegment search parameters, or null if a subsegment search should not be performed.
If is not null, specifies the conditions under which a subsegment search will be performed.
The array containing the translation units to search for.
member.returns: An array of objects, which mirrors the translation unit array. It has the exact same size and contains the search results for each translation unit with the same index within the translation unit array.

member.summary: Similar to , but allows passing a mask which specifies which TUs are actually searched. This is useful in document search contexts where some TUs are passed which should be used to establish a (text) context, but which should not be processed.
member.param: The settings that define the segment-level search parameters.
The settings that define the subsegment search parameters, or null if a subsegment search should not be performed.
If is not null, specifies the conditions under which a subsegment search will be performed.
The array containing the translation units to search for.
A bool array which specifies which TUs are actually searched (mask[i] = true). If null, the method behaves identically to .
member.returns: An array of objects, which mirrors the translation unit array. It has the exact same size and contains the search results for each translation unit with the same index within the translation unit array.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.DeleteTranslationUnitsWithIterator(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.RegularIterator@)
member.summary:
Deletes all translation units in the TM, using an iterator. The iterator will process only a fixed maximum number of translation units () and then the call will return, giving the client an opportunity to discontinue the process or update the UI before the next round-trip.
Optionally, a filter can be set on the iterator which then will only delete those TUs which satisfy the filter condition.
member.param: The iterator to use.
member.returns: The number of deleted translation units.

member.summary: Applies an to the translation units identified by the identifiers in the collection.
member.param: The edit script to apply
The update mode, which can be to update changed translation units in-place or add new translation units to the TM (which is only relevant if segment data has been changed).
The collection of TU IDs to apply the edit script to.
member.returns: The number of changed or edited translation units

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.EditTranslationUnitsWithIterator(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.EditScripts.EditScript,Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.EditScripts.EditUpdateMode,Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.RegularIterator@)
member.summary: Applies an to the translation units, using an iterator.
member.param: The edit script to apply
The update mode, which can be to update changed translation units in-place or add new translation units to the TM (which is only relevant if segment data has been changed).
The iterator to use. Note that a filter condition can be set on the iterator in which case the script will only be applied to those translation units which satisfy the filter condition.
member.returns: The number of changed or edited translation units
member.remarks: Note that a filter condition can also be set on the instead of the iterator. Depending on the back-end storage, it may be more efficient to set it on the iterator than on the edit script.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.PreviewEditTranslationUnitsWithIterator(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.EditScripts.EditScript,Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.RegularIterator@)
member.summary: Applies the specified edit script to the translation units in a TM, but unlike , the TUs will not be updated in the TM, but modified copies of the TUs will be returned to the caller. This can be used to "preview" the changes the edit script would apply.
member.param: The edit script
An iterator. See also the iterator-related remarks for .

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.GetDuplicateTranslationUnits(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.DuplicateIterator@)
member.summary:
Returns a set of potentially duplicated translation units in the TM, using a special . A group of TUs are considered potential duplicates of each other if the internal hash values for their source segments are identical. There may be several reasons for this being the case:
The TUs have the same source segment, but different translations
The TUs have different source segments, but only differ in complex tokens (controlled through the TM's ) which will result in the identical hash values,
The source segments only differ by whitespace or certain punctuation, which do not modify the hash values,
The hashing algorithm leads to collisions in which case the segments may be entirely different, but still result in the same hash value.
member.param: The iterator to use
member.returns: The translation units which are potential duplicates, or null if no more potential duplicates can be found.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.GetTranslationUnit(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.PersistentObjectToken)
member.summary: Retrieves the translation unit with the specified from the translation memory.
member.param: The ID of the translation unit to retrieve.
member.returns: The translation unit with the specified ID, or null if that TU does not exist.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.GetTranslationUnits(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.RegularIterator@)
member.summary:
Retrieves a set of translation units, using an iterator. At most translation units will be returned in one round-trip.
A can be set on the iterator in which case only those TUs which satisfy the filter condition will be returned.
See also the remarks on on how to avoid timeouts with filtered iteration.
member.param: The iterator
member.returns: The translation units, or null if no more translation units can be retrieved.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.UpdateTranslationUnitsMasked(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.TranslationUnit[],System.Boolean[])
member.summary: Updates (adds, overwrites, or merges) the specified translation units.
member.param: The translation units to update.

An optional mask with the same length as . If provided, only those TUs in will be updated for which the corresponding flag in is true. Those TUs for which the corresponding flag is false will only be used to establish context information. If no masking is required, this parameter can be null.
member.returns: An array of s with the same length as , which indicates, for each translation unit, the action taken by the translation memory.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.ReindexTranslationUnits(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.RegularIterator@)
member.summary:
Re-indexes the translation memory, using an iterator so that the client can update progress indicators or discontinue the process.
The same iterator instance should be passed in subsequent calls, in order to obtain the next page, and so on.
member.param: The iterator to use for the re-indexing process.
member.returns: False if the iterator is at the end of the TM or the TM is empty, true otherwise. The re-indexing process should be continued until the method returns false.
member.remarks: For larger TMs (> 100.000 TUs) it is recommended to also recompute the index statistics after the re-indexing finished (see ).

member.summary: Gets a URI which uniquely identifies this translation provider.

member.summary: Gets the user-friendly name of this provider. It is not necessarily unique across the system.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsTaggedInput
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether or not the translation provider engine supports processing of tagged input and will return input tags in the translation proposals. If false, the engine may drop all tags from search segments, and may not return tags in the output.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsScoring
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider produces scored results in the rank between [minScore, 100]. If false, no scores will be computed.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsSearchForTranslationUnits
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports searching for bilingual input TUs (i.e. the SearchTranslationUnit method group). If false, the service only supports searching for simple (monolingual) segments.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsMultipleResults
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the engine may return multiple results for a search. If false, at most one result (and translation proposal) will be computed.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsFilters
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports filters for text and attribute fields. If false, filters supplied in the search settings will be ignored.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsPenalties
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports penalties of various types. If false, all penalties supplied in the search settings will be ignored.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsStructureContext
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports a structure context specification and will consider it for searches. If false, the structure context will be ignored.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsDocumentSearches
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports document searches and will take document (textual) context into account.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsUpdate
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports updating/adding of translation units. If false, all update/add methods will return without effect. Note that implementations should not throw exceptions for unsupported methods.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsPlaceables
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports the detection and handling of placeables, and will return them as part of the search result.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsTranslation
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports translation search (exact and/or fuzzy search) and the generation of translation proposals. In most cases this flag will be true. If this value is false, the translation provider can not be used to request translations, but can still be used to search for concordance matches, if is true.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsFuzzySearch
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports fuzzy search. This value should be false if is false.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsConcordanceSearch
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports concordance search in the source or the target language. For more detailed information, see and .

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsSourceConcordanceSearch
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports concordance search in the source language.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsTargetConcordanceSearch
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider supports concordance search in the target language.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider.SupportsWordCounts
member.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the translation provider will compute and return word counts in searches.

member.name: T:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProviderCredentialStore
member.summary: This interface represents a storage mechanism for translation provider credentials. The host application will provide an implementation of this object, which will be passed on to the and components so they can retrieve and add credentials from and to the store. It is up to the store implementation whether it for instance persists its contents or not.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProviderCredentialStore.GetCredential(System.Uri)
member.summary: Gets a credential for the given URI.
member.param: The URI for which to retrieve the credential. Note that this does not necessarily have to be the translation provider URI itself. It can be a more general URI, for instance identifying the server on which the translation provider lives. This allows for reusing credentials for different translation providers hosted on the same server.
member.returns: A serialized credential; or null if no credential for the given URI is available.

This allows for reusing credentials for different translation providers hosted on the same server.
A serialized credential.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProviderCredentialStore.RemoveCredential(System.Uri)
member.summary: Removes the credential for the specified URI.
member.param: The URI for which to remove the credential. Note that this does not necessarily have to be the translation provider URI itself. It can be a more general URI, for instance identifying the server on which the translation provider lives. This allows for reusing credentials for different translation providers hosted on the same server.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProviderCredentialStore.Clear

Adds an array of translation units to the database. If hash codes of the previous translations are provided, a found translation will be overwritten. If none is found, or the hash is 0 or the collection is null, the operation behaves identical to .
If the provider doesn't support adding/updating, the implementation should return a reasonable but should not throw an exception.
member.param: An arrays of translation units to be added.
If provided, a corresponding array of a the hash code of a previous translation.
The settings used for this operation.
member.returns: An array of objects, which mirrors the translation unit array. It has the exact same size and contains the status of each add operation for each particular translation unit with the same index within the array.

member.summary: Adds an array of translation units to the database, but will only add those for which the corresponding mask field is true. If the provider doesn't support adding/updating, the implementation should return a reasonable ImportResult but should not throw an exception.
member.param: An arrays of translation units to be added.
The settings used for this operation.
A boolean array with the same cardinality as the TU array, specifying which TUs to add.
member.returns: An array of ImportResult objects, which mirrors the translation unit array. It has the exact same size and contains the status of each add operation for each particular translation unit with the same index within the array.

member.summary:
Adds an array of translation units to the database, but will only add those for which the corresponding mask field is true. If the previous translation hashes are provided, existing translations will be updated if the target segment hash changed.
If the provider doesn't support adding/updating, the implementation should return a reasonable ImportResult but should not throw an exception.
member.param: An arrays of translation units to be added.
Corresponding hash codes of a previous translation (0 if unknown). The parameter may be null.
The settings used for this operation.
A boolean array with the same cardinality as the TU array, specifying which TUs to add.
member.returns: An array of ImportResult objects, which mirrors the translation unit array. It has the exact same size and contains the status of each add operation for each particular translation unit with the same index within the array.

member.summary:
Updates the properties and fields of an existing translation unit if the source and target segments are unchanged or adds a new translation unit otherwise. If the provider doesn't support adding/updating, the implementation should return a reasonable ImportResult but should not throw an exception.
The translation unit should be initialized in a previous call to the translation memory, so that the ID property is set to a valid value.
member.param: The translation unit to be updated.
member.returns: The result of the operation.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProviderLanguageDirection.UpdateTranslationUnits(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.TranslationUnit[])
member.summary:
Updates the properties and fields of an array of existing translation units if the source and target segments are unchanged or adds new translation units otherwise. If the provider doesn't support adding/updating, the implementation should return a reasonable ImportResult but should not throw an exception.
The translation units should be initialized in previous calls to the translation memory, so that their ID properties are set to valid values.
member.param: The translation unit array to be updated.
member.returns: An array of results which mirrors the translation unit array. It has the exact same size and contains the results for each translation unit with the same index within the translation unit array.

member.returns: true if the provider's settings can be changed, and false otherwise.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProviderWinFormsUI.Edit(System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window,Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProvider,Sdl.LanguagePlatform.Core.LanguagePair[],Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProviderCredentialStore)
member.summary: Displays a dialog to interactively change any of the translation provider settings.
member.param: The window that will own the dialog
A translation provider descriptor, representing the translation provider to edit.
A collection of language pairs. If provided, the list of available translation providers will be filtered by these language directions.
A credential store object that can be used to retrieve credentials required.
member.returns: True if changes were made to the translation provider; false otherwise.
member.exception: Thrown when calling this method while return false.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProviderWinFormsUI.GetDisplayInfo(System.Uri,System.String)
member.summary: Gets display information for the specified translation provider.
member.param: A translation provider URI, representing the translation provider.
Optional translation provider state information, which can be used to determine certain aspects of the display information.
member.remarks: Note that this method can potentially be called very frequently so it is not advisable to instantiate the translation provider within its implementation.
member.returns: A object, containing display information that allows an application to represent the translation provider without having to instantiate it.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProviderWinFormsUI.GetCredentialsFromUser(System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window,System.Uri,System.String,Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ITranslationProviderCredentialStore)
member.summary: Gets the credentials from the user and puts these credentials in the credential store.
member.param: The window that will own the dialog
translation provider uri
translation provider state
credential store
member.returns: true if the user provided credentials or false if the user canceled

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.LanguageResourceBundle.Abbreviations
member.summary: Gets or sets the list abbreviations for this bundle's language.
member.remarks: Setting this property to null will force the default abbreviations for the language to be used during TM processing. In order to change the list of abbreviations, you can either manipulate the list returned, or assign an entirely new list.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.LanguageResourceBundle.CurrencyFormats
member.summary: Gets or sets the list currency formats for this bundle's language.
member.remarks: Setting this property to null will force the default currency formts to be used. In order to change the list of currency formats, you can either manipulate the list returned, or assign an entirely new list.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.LanguageResourceBundle.OrdinalFollowers
member.summary: Gets or sets the list ordinal followers for this bundle's language.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.LanguageResourceBundle.Variables
member.summary: Gets or sets the list variables for this bundle's language.
member.remarks: Setting this property to null will force the default variables for the language to be used during TM processing. In order to change the list of variables, you can either manipulate the list returned, or assign an entirely new list.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.LanguageResourceBundle.SegmentationRules
member.summary: Gets or sets the segmentation rules for this bundle's language.
member.remarks: Setting this property to null will force the default segmentation rules for the language to be used during TM processing. In order to change the segmentation rules, you can either manipulate the rules returned by this property, or assign an entirely new object.

member.name: T:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ScheduledReindexOperation
member.summary: When changing recognizer settings or when changing variables, abbreviations or ordinal followers, it might be necessary to re-index the Translation Memory in order to make sure these settings are applied to existing Translation Units. This class represents a scheduled re-indexing of a server-based translation memory on the Execution Server. This class can be used to schedule a re-indexing of a server-based translation memory and also to monitor the operation's status while it is running.

member.summary: Gets or sets the field group template. Can be null.

remarks.para: You need to call to persist the change after setting this property.
The template is potentially shared by a number of translation memories. Changes made to the template will affect all translation memories which refer to this template.
If you want to make field changes for this translation memory only, make those modifications through the property. Before you can do that, set the property to null.

member.exception: Thrown when this object has been deleted.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ServerBasedTranslationMemory.LanguageResourcesTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the object associated with this TM.
member.remarks:
The template is a shared entity that defines the language resources that are associated with one or more TMs. Modifying the template will therefore cause modifications to the shared data and alter the language resources for all associated TMs.
If you want to make language resource changes for this translation memory only, make those modifications through the property. Before you can do that, set the property to null. ///
member.exception: Thrown when this object has been deleted.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ServerBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.DeleteTranslationUnitsWithIterator(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.RegularIterator@)
member.summary:
Deletes all translation units in the TM, using an iterator. The iterator will process only a fixed maximum number of translation units () and then the call will return, giving the client an opportunity to discontinue the process or update the UI before the next round-trip.
Optionally, a filter can be set on the iterator which then will only delete those TUs which satisfy the filter condition.
member.param: The iterator to use.
member.returns: The number of deleted translation units.

member.summary: Applies an to the translation units identified by the identifiers in the collection.
member.param: The edit script to apply
The update mode, which can be to update changed translation units in-place or add new translation units to the TM (which is only relevant if segment data has been changed).
The collection of TU IDs to apply the edit script to.
member.returns: The number of changed or edited translation units

member.summary: Applies an to the translation units, using an iterator.
member.param: The edit script to apply
The update mode, which can be to update changed translation units in-place or add new translation units to the TM (which is only relevant if segment data has been changed).
The iterator to use. Note that a filter condition can be set on the iterator in which case the script will only be applied to those translation units which satisfy the filter condition.
member.returns: The number of changed or edited translation units
member.remarks: Note that a filter condition can also be set on the instead of the iterator. Depending on the back-end storage, it may be more efficient to set it on the iterator than on the edit script.

member.summary: Applies the specified edit script to the translation units in a TM, but unlike , the TUs will not be updated in the TM, but modified copies of the TUs will be returned to the caller. This can be used to "preview" the changes the edit script would apply.
member.param: The edit script
An iterator. See also the iterator-related remarks for .

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ServerBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.GetDuplicateTranslationUnits(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.DuplicateIterator@)
member.summary:
Returns a set of potentially duplicated translation units in the TM, using a special . A group of TUs are considered potential duplicates of each other if the internal hash values for their source segments are identical. There may be several reasons for this being the case:
The TUs have the same source segment, but different translations
The TUs have different source segments, but only differ in complex tokens (controlled through the TM's ) which will result in the identical hash values,
The source segments only differ by whitespace or certain punctuation, which do not modify the hash values,
The hashing algorithm leads to collisions in which case the segments may be entirely different, but still result in the same hash value.
member.param: The iterator to use
member.returns: The translation units which are potential duplicates, or null if no more potential duplicates can be found.

member.summary: Retrieves the translation unit with the specified from the translation memory.
member.param: The ID of the translation unit to retrieve.
member.returns: The translation unit with the specified ID, or null if that TU does not exist.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ServerBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.GetTranslationUnits(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.RegularIterator@)
member.summary:
Retrieves a set of translation units, using an iterator. At most translation units will be returned in one round-trip.
A can be set on the iterator in which case only those TUs which satisfy the filter condition will be returned.
See also the remarks on on how to avoid timeouts with filtered iteration.
member.param: The iterator
member.returns: The translation units, or null if no more translation units can be retrieved.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ServerBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.GetTranslationUnitsWithContextContent(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.RegularIterator@)
member.summary: Identical to except that the implementation will attempt to populate the and properties for any items in the collection of a tu
member.remarks: Implementations must ensure and are tokenized and that their collections are returned to the client.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ServerBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.UpdateTranslationUnitsMasked(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.TranslationUnit[],System.Boolean[])
member.summary: Updates (adds, overwrites, or merges) the specified translation units.
member.param: The translation units to update.

An optional mask with the same length as . If provided, only those TUs in will be updated for which the corresponding flag in is true. Those TUs for which the corresponding flag is false will only be used to establish context information. If no masking is required, this parameter can be null.
member.returns: An array of s with the same length as , which indicates, for each translation unit, the action taken by the translation memory.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ServerBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.ReindexTranslationUnits(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.RegularIterator@)
member.summary:
Re-indexes the translation memory, using an iterator so that the client can update progress indicators or discontinue the process.
The same iterator instance should be passed in subsequent calls, in order to obtain the next page, and so on.
member.param: The iterator to use for the re-indexing process.
member.returns: False if the iterator is at the end of the TM or the TM is empty, true otherwise. The re-indexing process should be continued until the method returns false.
member.remarks: For larger TMs (> 100.000 TUs) it is recommended to also recompute the index statistics after the re-indexing finished (see ).

The settings used for this operation.

The settings used for this operation.
A boolean array with the same cardinality as the TU array, specifying which TUs to add.

member.summary:
Adds an array of translation units to the database, but will only add those for which the corresponding mask field is true. If the previous translation hashes are provided, existing translations will be updated if the target segment hash changed.
If the provider doesn't support adding/updating, the implementation should return a reasonable ImportResult but should not throw an exception.
member.param: An arrays of translation units to be added.
Corresponding hash codes of a previous translation (0 if unknown). The parameter may be null.

A boolean array with the same cardinality as the TU array, specifying which TUs to add.
member.returns: An array of ImportResult objects, which mirrors the translation unit array. It has the exact same size and contains the status of each add operation for each particular translation unit with the same index within the array.

Updates the properties and fields of an existing translation unit if the source and target segments are unchanged or adds a new translation unit otherwise. If the provider doesn't support adding/updating, the implementation should return a reasonable ImportResult but should not throw an exception.
The translation unit should be initialized in a previous call to the translation memory, so that the ID property is set to a valid value.
member.param: The translation unit to be updated.
member.returns: The result of the operation.

If the provider doesn't support adding/updating, the implementation should return a reasonable ImportResult but should not throw an exception.
The translation units should be initialized in previous calls to the translation memory, so that their ID properties are set to valid values.
member.param: The translation unit array to be updated.
member.returns: An array of results which mirrors the translation unit array. It has the exact same size and contains the results for each translation unit with the same index within the translation unit array.

member.returns: An array of objects, which mirrors the segments array. It has the exact same size and contains the search results for each segment with the same index within the segments array.

member.summary: Performs a segment-level search, and optionally a subsegment search, for an array of segments, specifying a mask which specifies which segments should actually be searched (only those for which the corresponding mask bit is true are searched). If the mask is null, the method behaves identically to . Passing a mask only makes sense in document search contexts ( set to true).
member.param: The settings that define the segment-level search parameters.
The settings that define the subsegment search parameters, or null if a subsegment search should not be performed.
If is not null, specifies the conditions under which a subsegment search will be performed.
The array containing the segments to search for.
The array containing the segments to search for.
member.returns: An array of objects, which mirrors the segments array. It has the exact same size and contains the search results for each segment with the same index within the segments array.

member.summary: Performs a translation unit search, and optionally a subsegment search on the source segment
member.param: The settings that define the segment-level search parameters.
The settings that define the subsegment search parameters, or null if a subsegment search should not be performed.
If is not null, specifies the conditions under which a subsegment search will be performed.
The translation unit to search for.
member.returns: An object containing the results or an empty object if no results were found.

member.summary: Performs a translation unit search, and optionally a subsegment search on the source segment, for an array of translation units.
member.param: The settings that define the segment-level search parameters.
The settings that define the subsegment search parameters, or null if a subsegment search should not be performed.
If is not null, specifies the conditions under which a subsegment search will be performed.
The array containing the translation units to search for.
member.returns: An array of objects, which mirrors the translation unit array. It has the exact same size and contains the search results for each translation unit with the same index within the translation unit array.

member.summary: Similar to , but allows passing a mask which specifies which TUs are actually searched. This is useful in document search contexts where some TUs are passed which should be used to establish a (text) context, but which should not be processed.
member.param: The settings that define the segment-level search parameters.
The settings that define the subsegment search parameters, or null if a subsegment search should not be performed.
If is not null, specifies the conditions under which a subsegment search will be performed.
The array containing the translation units to search for.
A bool array which specifies which TUs are actually searched (mask[i] = true). If null, the method behaves identically to .
member.returns: An array of objects, which mirrors the translation unit array. It has the exact same size and contains the search results for each translation unit with the same index within the translation unit array.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ServerBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirection.Import(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemory.ImportSettings,System.String)

member.name: T:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.ServerBasedTranslationMemoryLanguageDirectionCollection
member.summary:
Represents the collection of language directions of a server-based translation memory (). Language directions can be added to and removed from this collection. In order to persist these changes you should save the translation memory itself (see ).
Saving a translation memory after adding or removing language directions will result in the corresponding physical bilingual translation memories being added to or deleted from the container which hosts the server-based translation memory.
All the language directions in a given translation memory should have a unique source-target language combination. Multiple source language are supported.

member.returns: The language direction matching the specified source and target language; or null if no such language direction exists.

member.returns: The language direction matching the specified source and target language; or null if no such language direction exists.

Whether to use Windows authentication. When set to false, and have to be specified. member.summary: A utility class that allows translation providers that implement the interface to return values that confirm to the suggested Uri scheme.

member.summary: Constructs an empty TranslationMemoryUriBuilder class.

member.summary: Constructs a TranslationMemoryUriBuilder class of the given type.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.TranslationProviderUriBuilder.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a TranslationMemoryUriBuilder class using the given type and protocol.
member.remarks: If the protocol value is set to the special value "file" then this will have an effect on how the property is stored. For "file" protocols the Resource property will always be converted back to a local Windows file format with server path separation characters '/' replaced by local file path separating characters '\'.
member.param: A type string which is used together with the protocol string to uniquely identify a translation provider. You may wish to use your company name or initials as part of this unique identifier. This must not contain the "." character and must not be equal to "file" as this is not compatible with the Translation Provider Uri Schema.
A protocol string used together with the type parameter to uniquely identify a translation provider.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.TranslationProviderUriBuilder.Resource
member.summary: An optional resource string.

For "file" protocols the Resource property will always be converted back to a local Windows file format with server path separation characters '/' replaced by local file path separating characters '\'.

member.name: T:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.IMigrationProject
member.summary:
A migration project encapsulates functionality to migrate one or more legacy translation memories to one or more new translation memories. Use this object as follows:
Add all legacy translation memories to the collection. A legacy translation memory can contain multiple language directions.
Then populate the collection by adding groups of one or more bilingual input translation memories with compatible language directions to it. A new translation meory will be created for every output translation memory in the collection.
Make sure the properties of the output translation memory are all set (see ).
Specify a object for each of the output translation memories (see.
Perform the migration process by either calling , or by first exporting all input translation memories indiviually (see ) and then creating all output translation memoies (see ).
The newly created translation memories are available through the property.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.IMigrationProject.InputTranslationMemories
member.summary: The collection of input legacy translation memories.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.IMigrationProject.OutputTranslationMemories
member.summary: The collection of output translation memories. A new translation memory will be created for every item in this collection.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.IMigrationProject.ProcessAll(System.EventHandler{Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.ProgressEventArgs})
member.summary: Performs the full migration process by exporting all input translation memories and subsequently creating all output translation memories.
member.remarks: This method can be called multiple times and will pick up the migration where it failed or was cancelled previously.
member.param: An event handler through which to report progress events and through which the migration process can be cancelled.

member.name: T:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.IOutputTranslationMemory
member.summary: Represents an output translation memory to be created within a migration project, to which the contents of one or more legacy translation memories (or language directions within such TMs) will be migrated. Holds settings required to create the new translation memory (, and ) and provides status information on the migration process.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.IOutputTranslationMemory.InputLanguageDirections
member.summary: The collection of input language direction data, from which content should be imported into the output translation memory.

member.summary: Gets or sets a object, which should be usd for creating the output translation memory.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.IOutputTranslationMemory.Setup
member.summary: Gets the setup information to be used for creating the output translation memory.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.IOutputTranslationMemory.ExpectedTUCount
member.summary: Gets the estimated number of translation units this output translation memory will contains after the migration is complete. Can be used for progress notifications. This is -1 if this number is not available (or cannot easily be obtained).

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.IOutputTranslationMemory.TranslationMemory
member.summary: Gets the newly created translation memory. Returns null before the translation memory has been created.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.IOutputTranslationMemory.PopulateSetup
member.summary: Automatically populate the setup information based on the language directions currently present in . This will reset any setup information in the output translation memory that is currently present. All changes to the setup should be done before the output translation memory is created.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.IOutputTranslationMemory.Process(System.EventHandler{Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.ProgressEventArgs})
member.summary: Creates the output translation memory and import all content.
member.remarks: This method assumes that all the input translation memories have been exported to TMX and will throw an exception if this is not the case.
member.param: A delegate which can be used to monitor progress and to cancel the migration process. May be null.

member.summary: Validates whether this output translation memory is ready to be processed. Throws an xception if it is not.

member.name: T:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.IOutputTranslationMemoryCollection
member.summary: Represents a collection of output translation memories (see ) in a migration project (see ).

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.IOutputTranslationMemoryCollection.Add
member.summary: Adds a new output translation memory to the collection. You can add input language directions to its collection.
member.returns: A representation of an output translation memory.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.IOutputTranslationMemoryCollection.Add(Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.IInputTranslationMemory,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds an output translation memory for a bilingual legacy input translation memory and optionally populates the setup information of the output translation memory () based of the setup of the input translation memory (see and ).
member.param: The language direction data, representing the content of a legacy TM to be migrated to the output TM.
Whether to automatically popluate the setup information of the output translation memory based on the setup information from the input translation memory.
member.returns: An object, containing the specified input language direction data.
member.exception: Thrown if the input translation memory has more than one language direction.

member.name: M:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.IOutputTranslationMemoryCollection.Add(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.IInputTranslationMemory},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds an output translation memory for a number of bilingual legacy input translation memories and optionally populates the setup information of the output translation memory () based of the setup of the input translation memories (see and ).
member.param: The language directions, representing the bilingual content of a number of legacy TMs to be migrated to the output TM.
Whether to automatically popluate the setup information of the output translation memory based on the merged setup information from the input translation memories.
member.returns: An object, containing the specified input language directions.
member.exception: Thrown if one of the input translation memories has more than one language direction.

member.summary: Represents the setup information that will be used to create an output translation memory (see ).

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the translation memory.

member.summary: Gets or sets the dsecription of the translation memory. Can be null.

member.summary: Gets or sets the copyright string of the translation memory. Can be null.

member.summary: Gets or sets the expiration date of the translation memory. Can be null.

member.summary: Gets or sets the language direction of this translation memory.

member.summary: Gets or sets the fuzzy indexes that will be created in the translation memory.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.ITranslationMemorySetupOptions.Recognizers
member.summary: Gets or sets which entities should be recognized by the translation memory.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.ITranslationMemorySetupOptions.TokenizerFlags
member.summary: Gets or sets the flags affecting tokenizer behaviour for this TM. Note that changing tokenizer flags may require reindexing.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.ITranslationMemorySetupOptions.WordCountFlags
member.summary: Gets or sets the flags affecting word count behaviour for this TM.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.ITranslationMemorySetupOptions.FGASupport
member.summary: Gets or sets the fine-grained alignment support for this TM.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.ITranslationMemorySetupOptions.Fields
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of fields for this translation memory. When using an automatic method of generating the setup information, this list can contain multiple fields with the same name but of different types. These differences must be resolved before starting the migration process or will result in an exception being thrown.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.ITranslationMemorySetupOptions.InputFieldIdentifierMappings
member.summary: Gets or sets the field identifier mappings, which map field names and types from the input (legacy) field definitions to the output field definitions.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.ITranslationMemorySetupOptions.LanguageResources
member.summary: Gets or sets the language resources to use for this translation memory. Can be null, in which case the default resources will be used.

member.name: P:Sdl.LanguagePlatform.TranslationMemoryApi.Upgrade.ITranslationMemorySetupOptions.TextContextMatchType
member.summary: Returns the specified for this TM when it was created.

member.summary: Indicates whether this TM was created with IdContextMatch support

member.summary: Indicates whether this TM uses legacy hashes
